    • getCashaccountBalanceByTenant

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepository.CashaccountBalanceChangeTransaction> getCashaccountBalanceByTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Retrieves daily cash account balance change transactions for all cash accounts belonging to the specified tenant.

      For each cash account and transaction date, computes:

      • withdrawals and deposits (transaction_type â‰¤ WITHDRAWAL/DEPOSIT)
      • interest (transaction_type = INTEREST_CASHACCOUNT)
      • fees (transaction_type = FEE)
      • net buys/sells (transaction_type BETWEEN ACCUMULATE and REDUCE)
      • dividends (transaction_type = DIVIDEND)
      • total net change
      Results are grouped by cash account and date, ordered by account and date.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID whose cash account transactions are aggregated
      Returns:
      a list of CashaccountBalanceChangeTransaction projections with daily metrics

    • getCashaccountBalanceByCashaccountAndDate

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepository.CashaccountBalanceChangeTransaction> getCashaccountBalanceByCashaccountAndDate(Integer idCashaccount, LocalDate fromDate)
      Retrieves daily cash account balance change transactions for the specified cash account starting from the given date.

      Computes the same breakdown as getCashaccountBalanceByTenant(Integer), but filters to a single cash account (?1) and transactions on or after ?2. Results are grouped by date and ordered by date.

      Parameters:
      idCashaccount - the ID of the cash account
      fromDate - the start date (inclusive) for transactions
      Returns:
      a list of CashaccountBalanceChangeTransaction projections with daily metrics

    • getCashaccountBalanceMaxFromDateByCashaccount

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) HoldCashaccountBalance getCashaccountBalanceMaxFromDateByCashaccount(Integer idCashaccount)
      Retrieves daily cash account balance change transactions for the specified cash account starting from the given date.

      Computes the same breakdown as getCashaccountBalanceByTenant(Integer), but filters to a single cash account (?1) and transactions on or after ?2. Results are grouped by date and ordered by date.

      Parameters:
      idCashaccount - the ID of the cash account
      fromDate - the start date (inclusive) for transactions
      Returns:
      a list of CashaccountBalanceChangeTransaction projections with daily metrics
